channel.title: posts on Inside Loner Mind
channel.description: Recent content in posts on Inside Loner Mind

item.title: The roughness of PS2 runs
item.description: Despite the huge library, it is always a struggle to overcome its speedrun challenges. PS2 requires heavy investment to experience the best version of some games. Seeing all of this makes our heads hurt or just come to a good conclusion as to why speedrunning back then was probably very expensive compared to now since the current generation has fair competition on PC due have the Load Time Removal support.

item.title: It is Live
item.description: It’s been so long and I guess that I finally managed to start this.
